title: Life and Youth - saints and martyrs and soldiers

content.question: Which of the following best describes the speaker’s attitude toward the “saints and martyrs and soldiers” (line 7) ?

choices.label: The speaker cannot comprehend their histories.
The speaker refuses to recognize their contributions.
The speaker is unwilling to sympathize with their suffering.
The speaker is unable to draw strength from their example.

content.answer: The speaker is unable to draw strength from their example.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
